content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I am indeed the landlord of this apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price. Keep in mind, I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position but prefer a more affordable option as a student. Initially thinking around 550 Euros per month, considering its location and size. However, I am open to further discussion.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am afraid 550 Euros per month is not acceptable for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make a higher offer. Remember, I am willing to accept any offer that meets my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the location and amenities, I can raise my proposal to 600 Euros per month. Let's see if we can reach an agreement on this amount.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for the offer. However, 600 Euros is still not enough. I am looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make a higher offer. Remember, I am willing to accept any offer that meets my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position, I can increase my bid to 625 Euros per month. It is closer to my limit, but I hope it satisfies your requirements for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for the offer. However, 625 Euros is still not enough. I am looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make a higher offer. Remember, I am willing to accept any offer that meets my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the current market trends and the apartment's desirable location, I am reluctantly reaching my financial limit. However, I can offer 650 Euros as my final proposal. I hope this amount is agreeable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month! Let's proceed with the lease agreement for this amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
